page.title: 16LAMERTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
Lamerton School is in the village of Lamerton.It is a very small school and there are 2 classrooms.There are 2 Teachers and 37 children(17 in one and 20 in the other class) We have a seeretary,who comes in for one day a week and a mealtime assistant who looks after us at lunchtime,a cook and a cleaner.Lamerton school has a video recorder,a colour television and a computer. We have many animals, including fish, gerbills, and a toad. We have no playing field and no hall.We have won the Lewtrenchard cross country trophy for 4 years running and the Tavistock carnival cup last year.We also won the Area Sports this year.We enjoy it here at Lamerton school.
CHARLES KINGDOM DANIEL WIGGINS.
